text: Robert Herbin (30 March 1939 – 27 April 2020) was a French football defender and manager. He was born in Paris. He played for Saint-Étienne and the national team. He managed Saint-Étienne and Red Star F.C. 93. Herbin died on 27 April 2020 in Saint-Étienne, France of heart failure at the age of 81.Robert Herbin passes away at the age of 81 ==Honours== ===As a player=== ;Saint-Étienne *Ligue 1: 1963–64, 1966–67, 1967–68, 1968–69, 1969–70 *Coupe de France: 1961–62, 1967–68, 1969–70 ===As a manager=== ;Saint-Étienne *Ligue 1: 1973–74, 1974–75, 1975–76, 1980–81 *Coupe de France: 1973–74, 1974–75, 1976–77 *European Cup: Runner-up 1975–76 ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Footballers from Paris Category:French football managers Category:France at the 1960 European Nations' Cup Category:People from Saint-Étienne
title: Robert Herbin
